quote: Let us always meet each other with smile, for the smile is the beginning of love.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: Before you can see the Light, you have to deal with the darkness.
author: Dan Millman

quote: When it comes to mastering a skill, time is the magic ingredient.
author: Robert Greene

quote: The outer conditions of a person's life will always be found to reflect their inner beliefs.
author: James Allen

quote: None are more hopelessly enslaved than those who falsely believe they are free.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: The act of taking the first step is what separates the winners from the losers.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: One machine can do the work of fifty ordinary men. No machine can do the work of one extraordinary man.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: There are no shortcuts to any place worth going.
author: Beverly Sills

quote: Life is about accepting the challenges along the way, choosing to keep moving forward, and savoring the journey.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: It is what we make out of what we have, not what we are given, that separates one person from another.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: We should not look back unless it is to derive useful lessons from past errors.
author: George Washington

quote: Great acts are made up of small deeds.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Ability is a poor man's wealth.
author: John Wooden

quote: No great discovery was ever made without a bold guess.
author: Isaac Newton

quote: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone elses. life.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Little by little, one travels far.
author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quote: The truth is, everyone is going to hurt you. You just got to find the ones worth suffering for.
author: Bob Marley

quote: The best way to find yourself is to lose yourself in the service of others.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Art, like morality, consists of drawing the line somewhere.
author: Gilbert Chesterton

quote: The single biggest problem in communication is the illusion that it has taken place.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Troubles are often the tools by which God fashions us for better things.
author: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: Everything is in your own heart.
author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote: If you're afraid - don't do it, - if you're doing it - don't be afraid!
author: Genghis Khan

quote: No tree, it is said, can grow to heaven unless its roots reach down to hell.
author: Carl Jung

quote: If you pray for rain, be prepared to deal with some mud.
author: Mary Engelbreit

quote: We are all self-made, but only the successful will admit it.
author: Earl Nightingale

quote: Think of yourself as dead. you have lived your life. Now, take what's left, and live it properly.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: Why do you stay in prison when the door is so wide open?
author: Rumi

quote: Whatever your mind can conceive and believe, it can achieve.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: Pleasure can be supported by an illusion; but happiness rests upon truth.
author: Nicolas Chamfort

quote: Confidence comes from crossing thresholds.
author: Kamal Ravikant

quote: Don't listen to the person who has the answers; listen to the person who has the questions.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Always dream and shoot higher than you know you can do. Do not bother just to be better than your contemporaries or predecessors. Try to be better than yourself.
author: William Faulkner

quote: He is richest who is content with the least, for content is the wealth of nature.
author: Socrates

quote: Enjoy when you can, and endure when you must.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: No one is useless in this world who lightens the burdens of another.
author: Charles Dickens

quote: Life is just the same as learning to swim. Do not be afraid of making mistakes, for there is no other way of learning how to live!
author: Alfred Adler

quote: I would rather die on my feet than live on my knees.
author: Euripides

quote: When uncomfortable, my instinct is not to avoid the discomfort but to become at peace with it.
author: Josh Waitzkin

quote: As soon as you trust yourself, you will know how to live.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: Life can be the scariest and most beautiful thing simultaneously.
author: Maxime Lagace

quote: People are weird. When we find someone with weirdness that is compatible with ours, we team up and call it love.
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: If you've made a mistake, it's better just to laugh at it.
author: Zen Proverb

quote: Decide what your truth is. Then live it.
author: Kamal Ravikant

quote: Success is the child of drudgery and perseverance. It cannot be coaxed or bribed; pay the price and it is yours.
author: Orison Swett Marden

quote: Success is not what you do when you are on top.  Success is how high you bounce when you hit the bottom.
author: Sonia Ricotti

quote: If I can pay the bills, I'm happy.
author: Morgan Wootten

quote: Success comes from knowing that you did your best to become the best that you are capable of becoming.
author: John Wooden

quote: A day without laughter is a day wasted.
author: Charlie Chaplin

quote: No man ever steps in the same river twice, for it's not the same river and he's not the same man.
author: Heraclitus
